1901140.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901140
In-book reference  : Book 16, Hadith 001
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 16, Hadith 001
1901140.text: Jabir said: “The Prophet (Allah bless him and give him peace) entered Mecca on the Day of Victory wearing a black turban.”

1901150.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901150
In-book reference  : Book 16, Hadith 002
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 16, Hadith 002
1901150.text: 'Amr ibn Huraith reported that his father said: "I saw a black turban on the head of Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace).”

1901160.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901160
In-book reference  : Book 16, Hadith 003
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 16, Hadith 003
1901160.text: 'Amr ibn Huraith reported that his father said: "The Prophet (Allah bless him and give him peace) addressed the people while wearing a black turban.”

1901170.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901170
In-book reference  : Book 16, Hadith 004
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 16, Hadith 004
1901170.text: Ibn 'Umar said: "When the Prophet (Allah bless him and give him peace) donned a turban, he let his turban hang down between his shoulders.”

1901180.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901180
In-book reference  : Book 16, Hadith 005
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 16, Hadith 005
1901180.text: Ibn 'Abbas said: “The Prophet (Allah bless him and give him peace) addressed the people while wearing a turban that was dasma’ [marked with traces of oil from his hair].
